originalText.text: paid $200 for denim jacket with gold buttons...the quality is awful...dangling flimsly gold buttons, thick wrinkled fabric and sizing way off...an XL shouldn't be too small for me since I"m a 10 and can usually do a L. I am not going to bother returning it since other reviews state that they only give store credits and I am not interested in more junk. Really disappointed. Shame on me for not reading more reviews before ordering. Not surprised that website now says "temporarily" closed.

originalText.text:
I was so happy to find out that my favourite clothing site Zcrave opened a store on Madison ave NYC.
I’m addicted to there fashion it is so unique and beautiful and it’s not only for me to say it’s from the amount of compliments that I’m getting from all my surroundings, so happy to have this store next to me !! 1281 Madison ave NYC.
Hight recommended !!!!!!!!!!!!

originalText.text: If I could give it no stars zip would. Customer service is horrible. Which is only through email. The 1st time I was super excited. I ordered a gorgeous trench leather coat which was made impeccably. But I couldn't fit it, so no biggie. Not realizing that you get a store credit. But ok they have other items I like as well. So I get a gift card with my money back on it and order 2 items. The items were never delivered and they say they were. But they weren't,  so basically I'm out 100s of dollars and my 2 items with money on my gift card still in which I'm scared to use cause I feel like I got scammed. All I can do is email customer service and they tell me they have done their part. This is so unfair and crazy. I will never again buy from this place ever again. And I suggest you don't neither. BUYERS BEWARE... you spend your hard earned money fir a company not to even care this is sad.

originalText.text: Zcrave still has fox fur on their racks. It’s abhorrent to sell fur and use those animals lives for your profit. Zcrave, announce a fur free policy now.

originalText.text: Definitely the best store in New York! Amazing styles and personal great service!
